name: PersonaChat
summary: A chit-chat dialogue dataset where each of two crowdworkers is assigned a persona (a set of 5 profile sentences) and they have a conversation in character​:contentReference[oaicite:91]{index=91}. There are 10,907 dialogues with over 162k utterances​:contentReference[oaicite:92]{index=92}. The goal is to build agents that can integrate persona information into the conversation naturally.
size: 10,907 dialogues, 162,064 utterances​:contentReference[oaicite:93]{index=93}. Each persona profile: 4-5 sentences (1,155 unique personas in total).
download: Facebook ParlAI provides PersonaChat data. Also on HuggingFace as `personachat`.
notes: This dataset is often used for personalized dialogue modeling. In the conversation, each speaker tries to reveal personal facts naturally. Metrics involve engagingness and consistency. It's not question-answering per se, but multi-turn open-ended dialogue. Often used in training conversational models (like BlenderBot).
